title: Council Decision 2013/144/CFSP of 21 March 2013 amending Decision 2011/172/CFSP concerning restrictive measures directed against certain persons, entities and bodies in view of the situation in Egypt
header:
22.3.2013 EN Official Journal of the European Union L 82/54
COUNCIL DECISION 2013/144/CFSP
of 21 March 2013
amending Decision 2011/172/CFSP concerning restrictive measures directed against certain persons, entities and bodies in view of the situation in Egypt
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union and in particular Article 29 thereof,
Whereas:
(1) On 21 March 2011, the Council adopted Decision 2011/172/CFSP (1).
(2) On the basis of a review of Decision 2011/172/CFSP, the restrictive measures should be renewed until 22 March 2014.
(3) Decision 2011/172/CFSP should be amended accordingly,
main_body:
In Article 5 of Decision 2011/172/CFSP, the second paragraph is replaced by the following:
"This Decision shall apply until 22 March 2014.".
This Decision shall enter into force on the date of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Union.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 21 March 2013.
For the Council
The President
P. HOGAN
(1)  OJ L 76, 22.3.2011, p. 63.
